basis: User states intent to follow the one-plate plan tonight and prep in advance; no actual eating occurred in the log yet.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit conflict; user acknowledges BED but expresses resolve and feasibility.
negative_thought_patterns: Minimal; mentions BED as tough but frames routine as doable; no self-blame or all-or-nothing thinking.
emotional_triggers: Acknowledgment that BED is challenging; cravings are a potential trigger; stress related to managing BED may trigger impulsive eating.
coaching_notes: Maintain supportive, practical tone; reinforce logging and preparation; address cravings with a 2-minute pause and water; encourage quick meal assembly; plan for contingencies if cravings increase; consider adding brief post-meal check-ins to confirm action taken.
